dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models
dependent_to.name: py-gradio

dependent_to.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependent_to.name: py-jinja2

dependent_to.description:
A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the
existing templating languages.
dependent_to.name: py-mako

dependent_to.description: Automatic documentation from sources, for MkDocs.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocstrings

dependent_to.description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-quart

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description:
An adaptation of the popular mkdocs-material theme for the Sphinx
documentation tool.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-immaterial

dependent_to.description: Patches Jinja2 v3 to restore compatibility with earlier Sphinx versions.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-jinja2-compat

dependent_to.description: The Swiss Army knife of Python web development
dependent_to.name: py-werkzeug

description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
name: py-markupsafe

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
